short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Using AI technology, convert screenshots, design drafts, and prompts into front-end code(HTML/Tailwind/React/Vue/Bootstrap/Ionic).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using powerful AI technology, convert screenshots, design drafts, and prompts into front-end code(HTML/Tailwind/React/Vue/Bootstrap/Ionic).
Screenshot to code, convert design to code, prompts to code.

AI-powered UI builder:
convert screenshots, mockups and Figma designs and prompts into clean, functional code using AI.

Effortless UI Translation:
Transform screenshotss, design drafts, and prompts into front-end code seamlessly, streamlining the development process.

Intuitive Integration:
User-friendly extension that seamlessly integrates with your workflow for instant code generation.

Accelerate Development:
Boost productivity by converting visual designs into front-end code in a fraction of the time.

Visual Learning Aid:
Learn and understand UI development through a visual translation of design elements to code.

Support for mainstream front-end frameworks:
We support generating code for these front-end frameworks: HTML + Tailwind, HTML + CSS, React + Tailwind, Vue + Tailwind, Bootstrap, Ionic + Tailwind, and many more!

Combines the capabilities of many large models:
Such as Claude Sonnet 3.5, GPT-4o, GPT-4 Vision for image recognition, DALL-E 3 for image generation
